name: HireforU
description: Talent Acquisition can be a messy business, and recruiting top talent is getting tougher and tougher – especially for tech roles. We set up HireForU to turn a fresh page in our industry’s story by demanding absolute integrity from everything we do, with complete transparency to back it up. The world has moved on and we’ve moved with it – utilising the best technology and tools available to provide a transparent, insightful, and efficient service for our clients. We pride ourselves for being India's first boutique staffing agency helping companies hire talent fitting in their culture. From providing video clips of interviews, Culture Audit’s, to valuable insight on the candidate’s personality and their perception of clients’ brands, we don’t just talk about change; we are the change that our industry has been waiting for. Driving good behaviour from our consultants means rewarding them for client and candidate satisfaction, not the number of calls they make, CVs they send out, or even the roles they fill.
features: Ultimately, our purpose is to help our clients attract and hire better and more diverse talent whilst giving back to the community in which we serve.
We understand that there should be more choice when it comes to commercial options too.

From searching for one-off candidates with niche skills, to project managing the recruitment of entire teams, or advising on Employer Value Proposition, we offer a variety of services which enable our clients to succeed.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Matching Talent & Culture
ShortDescription: Talent Acquisition can be a messy business, and recruiting top talent is getting tougher and tougher – especially for tech roles.
enhanced_description: HireforU is a boutique staffing agency, headquartered in Gurugram, Haryana, India, that launched in 2022. It specializes in talent acquisition, particularly for challenging tech roles. The service is founded on principles of absolute integrity and complete transparency, utilizing modern technology and tools to provide a transparent, insightful, and efficient recruitment experience for clients. HireforU prides itself on being India's first boutique staffing agency focused on helping companies hire talent that genuinely fits their culture. Their unique offerings include providing video clips of interviews, conducting proprietary Culture Audits, and delivering valuable insights into a candidate's personality and their perception of client brands. Unlike traditional agencies, HireforU drives consultant behavior by rewarding them based on client and candidate satisfaction, rather than call volumes, CV submissions, or placements. The core purpose is to help clients attract and hire better and more diverse talent, while aiming to boost Hiring Manager confidence and productivity. HireforU offers flexible commercial options and a variety of services, ranging from searching for one-off candidates with niche skills to project managing the recruitment of entire teams, and advising on Employer Value Proposition (EVP).
